newsitem.title: USA: CBS IN AFFILIATION DEAL WITH TCI.
newsitem.headline: CBS IN AFFILIATION DEAL WITH TCI.

text.p: CBS Inc said Wednesday it signed an affiliation deal with Tele-Communications Inc that would allow CBS Eye on People, its cable television network, the first step in being carried on TCI's cable systems.
TCI, with more than 14 million subscribers, is the largest cable operator in the United States.
It was not immediately known how many of the systems would carry the network, a CBS spokeswoman said.
CBS has signed similar deals with two other giant operators, Time Warner Inc, and U S West Media Group's Media One.
CBS said its goal is to have 10 million subscribers by the end of 1997. It currently has 4.6 million subscribers on both cable and direct broadcast satellite systems.
CBS is a unit of Westinghouse Electric Corp
